meanings.definition: A small room or chamber in an ancient Egyptian tomb used for storing funerary offerings.
meanings.sent1: The serdabs in the tomb were filled with precious items for the afterlife.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists discovered several serdabs while exploring the ancient tomb.
meanings.sent3: The mummy decided to redecorate the serdabs with colorful hieroglyphics.
meanings.sent4: The serdabs whispered stories of the past to those who dared to listen.
meanings.sent5: The flickering torchlight revealed the serdabs' hidden treasures.
